title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
of Lae'zel. Choosing dialogue 3 will gain the approval of Lae'zel. She continues to say the verses, you feel pain but also power. You hear the Dream Visitor call out to remove Lae'zel from the device. You will have the following dialogue options.

[DECEPTION] Your tadpole is changing, growing. You have to resist the machine! [WISDOM] Focus your mind. Try to overload the device. [CONSTITUTION] Pursue the visions you saw. See where they lead. [ARCANA] Draw on the zaith'isk's power, take it as your
